msg_forgot_pw_first: Do you want to reset your password?
msg_forgot_pw_second: To receive the password reset link, enter the registered e-mail.
new_password_required: New password is a required field.
invalid_password_validate: A password must be between 8 and 20 characters in a combination of alphanumeric characters and special characters.
msg_reset_password_success: E-mail including the password reset link was sent to the entered address. Please check your e-mail now.
msg_url_expire: The link has expired. Issue a new link and try again.
go_to_login: Go to the Log in screen
